member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout
member.summary: Represents a breakout module to interface with custom electronics.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupDigitalInput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.GlitchFilterMode,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.ResistorMode)
member.summary: Returns a digital input interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to assign to the interface.
A value from the enumeration that specifies whether to enable the glitch filter on this interface.
The resistor mode for the interface port.
member.exception: The specified pin has already been reserved on this module.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupDigitalOutput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a digital output interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to assign to the interface.
The initial state to place on the interface output port.
member.exception: The specified pin has already been reserved on this module.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupDigitalIO(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,System.Boolean,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.GlitchFilterMode,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.ResistorMode)
member.summary: Returns a digital input/output interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to assign to the interface.
The initial state to place on the interface port; this value becomes effective as soon as the port is enabled as an output port.
A value from the enumeration that specifies whether to enable the glitch filter on this interface.
The resistor mode for the interface port.
member.exception: The specified pin has already been reserved on this module.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupInterruptInput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.GlitchFilterMode,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.ResistorMode,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.InterruptMode)
member.summary: Returns an interrupt input interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to assign to the interface.
A value from the enumeration that specifies whether to enable the glitch filter on this interface.
The resistor mode for the interface port.
The interrupt mode for the interface port.
member.exception: The specified pin has already been reserved on this module.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupAnalogInput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin)
member.summary: Returns an analog input interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to assign to the interface.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupAnalogOutput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin)
member.summary: Returns an analog output interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to assign to the interface.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Breakout.SetupPWMOutput(Gadgeteer.Socket.Pin)
member.summary: Returns an pulse width modulation (PWM) output interface associated with the specified pin on this module.
member.param: The pin to use for the PWM interface.
